Nov 10 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *HALF-YEAR REPORT
*H1 PRETAX LOSS -80.3 MILLION STG VERSUS -24.2 MILLION STG LOSS YEAR AGO *H1 REVENUE ROSE 0.8 PERCENT TO 516.1 MILLION STG *AVEVA - INTERIM DIVIDEND IS BEING INCREASED 4.8% TO 13.0P PENCE (H1 FY21: 12.4 PENCE). *AVEVA - WE ARE SEEING RESUMPTION OF STRUCTURAL GROWTH, DRIVEN BY INCREASED DIGITALISATION AND NET ZERO PROJECTS *AVEVA - ALSO OBSERVING AN INCREASE IN ACTIVITY IN ENERGY AND MARINE SECTORS *AVEVA - BELIEVE THAT OUR FIRST HALF RESULTS FORM A STRONG FOUNDATION FOR US TO BUILD ON AND TO MEET OUR MEDIUM-TERM TARGETS


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 10-NOV-202107:00:05 GMT
